1924719.treated_as: The Roar of the Raging calamity

1924891.effect:
When a card or effect is activated when you control another "Raging Calamity" or a "Hunter's Calamity" card is activated; destroy up to 3 cards in your Spell/Trap zone or hand, then apply the following effects depending on the type of cards (Monster, Spell or Trap) destroyed this way:
● Monster : Negate that effect
● Spell : Destroy that card
● Trap : Add a "Raging Calamity" monster from your deck to your hand.
If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can special summon 1 "Raging Calamity" monster from your deck.
1924891.name: The Raging Calamity Attack
